\alnum{b} (bAladaMte joVlADuva) koVTina hiMBAga.

\banum

\num{3} (mAtanADuvudara mUlaka) oMdu vishiSaTx sithxti, anuBava, \mo vanunx uMTumADu: \eng{he talked himself hoarse} avanu gaMTalu oDeyuvaSuTx mAtanADida; gaMTalu hUtu hoVguvavarege mAtanADida. \eng{how did you talk them into?} niVnu heVge mAtanADi avaru adanonxpupxvaMte mADide? \eng{talked them out of the difficulty} cAkacakayxteyiMda mAtanADi kaSaTxda parisithxtiyiMda avaranunx pArumADida.

\bentry

\pron{Telf} 
\gl{\kirx}
\expl{(\BU\ matutx \BUkaq\ \eng{told} \ucAcx\ ToVlfDx).}
\bmng
\emng

\noindent
\gl{\sakirx}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} (bAyalilx yA barahada mUlaka) heVLu; kathisu; tiLisu; okakxNisu: \eng{tell me a tale} nanagoMdu kathe heVLu. \eng{every picture tells a story} parxtiyoMdu citarxvU oMdu kathe heVLutatxde. 
\num{2} mAtinalilx-- heVLu, tiLisu, usuru, vivarisu: \eng{tell me your name} ninanx hesaru heVLu. \eng{tell me all about it} adara bagegx elalxvanUnx vivarisu. 
\num{3} ADu; heVLu: \eng{you told me a lie} niVnu nanage suLuLx heVLide. 
\num{4} vayxtAyxsa--garxhisu, tiLi: \eng{cannot tell them apart} avara naDuve parasapxra vayxtAyxsavanunx garxhisalAre. \eng{cannot tell him from his brother} avana hAgU avana soVdarana naDuve vayxtAyxsaveV tiLiyuvudilalx. 
\num{5} KaMDitavAgi heVLu; daqDhapaDisu: \eng{it is not easy, I can tell you} nAnu KaMDitavAgi heVLutetxVne, adu sulaBavalalx aMta. 
\num{6} (\kanmu\ cunAvaNeya mata(OTu)gaLanunx) eNisu; gaNane mADu (aneVka veVLe \akirx\ saha): \eng{we were} \eng{18 men all told} elAlx (eNisidare) nAvu \eng{18} janaridedxvu. 
\num{7} (vayxkitxyanunx) nideRVshisu; (obabxnige) adhikaqtavAgi heVLu, apapxNe mADu, AdeVsha niVDu: \eng{tell him to wait for me} nanagoVsakxra kAyuvaMte avanige heVLu. \eng{tell him to stop} nilulxvaMte avanige apapxNe mADu. 
\num{8} heVLu; sUcisu; parxkaTapaDisu: \eng{your face tells me everything} ninanx muKa nanage elalxvanUnx--heVLutatxde, parxkaTapaDisutatxde. 
\num{9} munenxcacxrike--niVDu, koDu; ecacxrisu: \eng{I told you so} nAnu ninage aMte ecacxrike koTiTxdedx. 
\num{10} mAhiti yA vaNaRne niVDu; guTaTxnunx parxkaTisu (\akirx\ saha): \eng{I told of the plan} A yoVjaneya viSaya nAnu tiLiside. \eng{promise you won't tell} niVnu (mAhitiyanunx) parxkaTisuvudilalxveMdu mAtu koDu. 
\num{11} tiLisu; tiLivaLike koDu; barahadalilx vivarisu, nirUpisu; boVdhisu: \eng{this book tells you how to read} I pusatxka heVge OdabeVkenunxvudanunx--tiLisutatxde, boVdhisutatxde. 
\enum
\emng

\noindent
\gl{\akirx}
\expl{}
\bmng
\bnum
\num{1} pariNAmakAriyAgu; gaMBiVra pariNAma biVru: \eng{every blow tells} parxtiyoMdu ETU pariNAmakAriyAgutatxde. \eng{strain began to tell on him} (kelasada) sharxma yA otatxDa avana meVle gaMBiVra pariNAma biVralupakarxmisitu. 
\num{2} nijavanunx, satayxvanunx--parxkaTisu, bahiraMgagoLisu, bayalumADu: \eng{time will tell} kAlakarxmeVNa nija tiLiyutatxde, tiLidubarutatxde; kAlaveV nijavanunx, satayxsaMgatiyanunx--parxkaTisutatxde. 
\num{3} parxBAva--biVru, hoMdiru: \eng{the evidence tells against you} sAkaSxyX ninage virudadhxvAgi nuDiyutatxde, parxBAva biVrutatxde. 
\enum
\emng

\alnum{h} (nAmapadagaLa joteyalilx) yAvudAdarU vaqtitx, havAyxsa, \mo vanunx parxtinidhisuva shabadxgaLalilx: \eng{the theatre} raMgaBUmi. \eng{went on the stage} naTa vaqtitx hiDida. \eng{the hustings} cunAvaNegaLu; cunAvaNA vayxvasethx. \eng{fond of the bottle} kuDitada vAyxmoVhavuLaLx; madayxda havAyxsavuLaLx.

\numie
\num{2} (vishiSaTx GaTanAvaLi, saninxveVshagaLu, \mo vakekx saMbaMdhisida) kAlAvadhi; yuga: \eng{the times of the Mughals} mogalf doregaLa kAla.

\num{4} (vayxkitxya) jiVvAvadhi; jiVvita kAla; jiVvamAna: \eng{will last my time} adu nananx jiVvamAnada tanaka bALutatxde, nananx jiVvAvadhige sAkAgutatxde. 
\num{5} (\AmA) jeYlushikeSx; seremanevAsa(da shikeSx): \eng{he is doing time} avanu jeYlushikeSx anuBavisutitxdAdxne. 
\num{6} kalikekAla; aBAyxsAvadhi; kelasa \mo vanunx kaliyuva kAla, avadhi: \eng{he served his time in the army} avanu seYnayxdalilx kalikeya kAla kaLeda.

\numie

\num{9} gaBARvadhi; gaBaR dharisiruva kAla: \eng{is far on in her time} avaLige (herigeya) dina tuMbutitxde. 
\num{10} herigeya dina, tAriVKu: \eng{is near her time} avaLige dina tuMbide; herigeya dina baMditu. 
\num{11} maraN--kAla, dina: \eng{my time is drawing near} nananx maraNakAla samiVpisutAtx baMdide. 
\num{12} (\Eva\ yA \bava dalilx) jiVvanada yA oMdukAlada jiVvanada sithxti (\kanmu) AthiRka sithxtigati: \eng{bad times} duBiRkaSxda kAla; keTaTx kAla. \eng{hard times} mugagxTiTxna, kaSaTxda kAla. 
\num{13} (\bava dalilx)(EnanAnxdarU aneVka paTuTx hecicxsi heVLuvAga, guNAkAradalilx) sarati; bAri; paTuTx; sala: \eng{three times three is nine} mUrumUrala oMbatutx. \eng{ten times easier} hatutx paTuTx sulaBatara.

\num{16} (kelasa \mo vugaLanunx mADalu) tegedukoMDa kAla; hiDida samaya.

\banum

\num{4} keVvala naMbike; pariVkiSxsade heVLike \mo vanunx satayx yA nirAdhAra eMdu naMbuvudu. 
\num{5} (vAyxpAra) KAtirx sAla; naMbike udadxri: \eng{obtained goods on trust} KAtirx sAlada meVle mAlugaLanunx paDeda. 
\num{6} naMbike; naMbikeya hoNe; inonxbabxra naMbikeyiMda odagida namamx javAbAdxri: \eng{am in a position of trust} nananxdu naMbikeya hoNegArike. 
\numi{7} (\nAyxshA) 
\banum
\alnum{a} nAyxsa vishAvxsa; beVrobabxna parxyoVjanAthaR nivaRhisabeVkAda Asitxge obabxnanunx hesarige mAtarx oDeyananAnxgi mADi avanalilx naMbike iDuvudu. 
\alnum{b} nAyxsAnuBoVga; nAyxsAnuBoVgada hakukx; yArigAgi nAyxsa iTiTxdeyoV avanu adariMda parxyoVjana paDeyuva hakukx. 
\alnum{c} nAyxsa; nAyxsavAgiTaTx Asitx. 
\alnum{d} nAyxsa saMbaMdha; nAyxsadAranigU nAyxsada AsitxgU iruva saMbaMdha. 
\eanum
\numie
\num{8} keYyeNe; nAyxsa; obabxna vashakekx opipxsida vasutx yA vayxkitx. 
\num{9} nAyxsada hoNe: \eng{have fulfilled my trust} nananx nAyxsada hoNe nivaRhisidedxVne. 
\numi{10} 
\banum
\alnum{a} nAyxsadashiRgaLu, vishavxsathxru, dhamaRdashiRgaLu, meVlivxcAraNe noVDikoLuLxva saMsethx. 
\alnum{b} dhamaRdashiRgaLa yA nAyxsadashiRgaLa yA vishavxsathxra--maMDali.

\numie
\num{11} kUDuvAyxpAra saMsethx; peYpoVTi kaDame mADalu yA niSaPxlagoLisalu halavu vAyxpAra saMGagaLu elAlx hoNegArikeyanUnx keVMdarx samitige vahisi vahivATu naDesuva saMsethx; (\kanmu) elAlx baMDavALa sATxkugaLanUnx keVMdarx samitige vagARyisi, pAludAraru tamamx mata calAvaNe hakakxnUnx biTuTxkoTuTx, keVvala lABadalilx pAlugoLuLxvudanunx mAtarx uLisikoMDa saMsethx.

\num{3} naMbikeya AdhArada meVle.
